channel.title: SuperUser on Keith Atherton
channel.description: Recent content in SuperUser on Keith Atherton

item.title: Power Apps Super User
item.description: I’m very proud to announce that I’ve been awarded Power Apps Super User in 2023 Season 1 by the awesome Microsoft Power Platform Community! Helping others is a privilege and something I’m passionate about. I’m also very grateful to everyone who has helped and supported me. Here is the official announcement: https://powerusers.microsoft.com/t5/News-Announcements/Announcing-Super-Users-2023-Season-1/td-p/2066953 Check out the Microsoft Power Platform Community here: https://powerusers.microsoft.com/
